Name:
* Philip Grippaldi USA disqualified for doping. 




Men's Middle-heavyweight - Weightlifting - Montreal 1976 Summer Olympics
Event Format:
     
     Athletes competed in two types of lift: the snatch, in which they raised the bar over the head in one movement, and the clean & jerk, in which they raised the bar i two movements using the combined strength of arms and legs. Each athlete was allowed three attempts at each type of lift. The best result in each type of lift counted in the final score for the athlete.  Event facts: Men's Middle-heavyweight competition was held at the St. Michel Arena and 19 athletes participated in the event. 





These results for Men's Middle-heavyweight - Montreal 1976 Summer Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database
